aththa.aya sithu widihatama mihiran awith hitiya.ikmanata andum maru karaganna kamarayata yana atharathuradi sandamalita mihiranwa dakinna puluwan wuna.ohu hitiye sandaluthale simenthi biralu bammata athdeka barakaragena .eeth ee athwala welila unnu thamange naganiyawa dakka sandamali yaksharuda wuna.pite ellagena hiti pasal bagaya galawala wisi kala sandamali sandaluthaleta kada panala , mihirange athe welila hiti manikge kammulata paharak ella kale hithagannawath bari wegayakin.thamange naganiya thaman aadaya kala tharunayage hitha horakam karala!

tikak hithanna kuda lamayekuta dalwa athi pahansilak dakinnata labunahoth ohu eyata ithamathma asakaranawa.koyi mohothaka hari eya athaga balimata sithayi.wadihitiyan allanna epa kiyana nisath eya ohuta hasu nowannata thabana nisath eya alla balimatama nithara sithanawa.hamoma eyata kiyanawa eeka allanna epa pichchenawa.ethakota dawillayi.samahara wita oyath pichchila getath awilila winasa wela yayi kiyala.namuth ara lamaya pichchenawa gini gannawa kiyana eewa danne nathi nisa koyi mohothaka hari allanawa.hithin mawaganna me lamaya kawuruwath nathiwelawak balala yamak lagata aragena usakin thibena pahan dalla alluwothin atha pichchimath sahaga kalabala wela karaganna winasaya.samahara wita methanadi sulu thuwalayak witharak wela nawathinnath puluwan wagema mulu agamath pichchila geth ekkama winasa wela yanna wunath puluwan neda?.waradawa ganna hodana niyama budun ho wenath budun yayi ayek nowa gauthama budurajanan wahanse pamanayi.un wahansege dharmaya melowa yahapatha udesama pamanakma nowa delewa yahapatha udesama desana karana laduwaki.siyaluma sathwayatama sathara apayen midima udesama desana karana laddaki.darmaya gana saka athikara noganna.sahithya wagema dharmaya gana liyawuna patha pothada sulabawa atha.soyagena kiyawa niwaradi wanna.
